item.title: Labour should stick to manifesto pledge on tax, deputy leader says
item.description: The government has repeatedly refused to rule out increasing income tax in this month's Budget.

item.title: Holocaust survivor and educator Manfred Goldberg dies aged 95
item.description: The German Jewish boy who saw his school closed by the Nazis dedicated his life to educating young people.

item.title: PM 'angry and frustrated' at mistaken prisoner releases
item.description: One of the men, fraudster Billy Smith, has handed himself back in but Brahim Kaddour-Cherif, an Algerian sex offender, is still at large.

item.title: Andrew asked by Democrats in US Congress to appear for questioning over Epstein links
item.description: The panel, which does not have the power to subpoena Andrew, made the request as part of its investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: 'Mentality, approach & preparation have improved'
item.description: Lando Norris says he owes his return to the lead of the world championship to improved consistency in the past couple of months.
